name: Authentik
description: Authentik is an open-source Identity Provider (IdP) focused on flexibility and versatility. It supports SAML 2.0, OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, LDAP, SCIM, and RADIUS protocols, providing SSO, MFA, and user lifecycle management as a self-hosted alternative to Okta, Auth0, or Entra ID.

notes.text: After installation, navigate to `http://<IP>:9000/if/flow/initial-setup/` to create your admin account (akadmin).
Database and secret key credentials are stored in `~/authentik.creds`. Secure this file immediately.
Authentik listens on port `9000` (HTTP) and `9443` (HTTPS). Configure a reverse proxy with TLS for production use.
The initial build process compiles Go and Node.js components from source, which may take 10-20 minutes depending on system resources.
Authentik 2025.10+ no longer requires Redis; all functionality is handled by PostgreSQL.
